name: Apollo Perception Visualizer 3D Sensor
description:
This sensor will visualize bounding boxes on objects as detected by Apollo Stack. It does not publish any data and instead subscribes to a topic from Apollo perception module. The color of the boxes are:
	[
		"Car": "Green"
		"Pedestrian": "Yellow"
		"Bicycle": "Cyan"
		"Unknown":  "Magenta"
	]
See {{DOCS_HOST}}/docs/simulation-content/sensors-list/#apollo-perception-visualizer-3d for more details.
